screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .ymi file in Shiru Yach*PMS
screenshot.caption: YMI file open in Shiru Yach*PMS

description: Yach*PMS is designed to emulate the MuzCell sound board. It was developed by shiru8bit, also known as Shiru, who has created many esoteric chiptune trackers.

Users who want to modify how Yach*PMS plays notes can do so using the program's Instrument Editor. After editing Yach*PMS's instrument settings, users can save those settings to a YMI file. They can then load the YMI file at a later time, to apply the settings it contains.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ymi file in Shiru Yach*PMS
images.caption: YMI file open in Shiru Yach*PMS
